Description.Text: Location The hotel is conveniently situated a short 20-minute drive from the airport. There are numerous points of interest surrounding the Bari hotel, such as Teatro Petruzzelli (7.6 km away), Forte di Sant'Antonio (7.8 km away) and Teatro Margherita (7.8 km away). Facilities The establishment was renovated in 2012. The establishment comprises a total of 28 accommodation units. A lobby and a reception are available to guests. Services and facilities at the hotel include internet access, wireless internet access, a library and a transfer service. Shopping facilities are available. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. Guests travelling in their own vehicles can make use of the available parking spaces. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace can be found in most rooms. Each accommodation unit features a double bed or a sofa-bed. Cots are available for children. A safe and a minibar also feature. Internet access, a TV and wireless internet access are provided for guests' convenience. In the bathrooms, guests will find a shower and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The swimming pool is ideal for a refreshing dip. Sun loungers and parasols offer the ideal way to unwind. Variety is offered by the range of sports and leisure options available at the establishment, including beach volleyball, canoeing, kayaking, table tennis, bowling and a spa. A wellness area with a solarium is available. Meals The establishment offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast and half board. The establishment additionally offers snacks. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the establishment: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.

The hotel is conveniently situated a short 20-minute drive from the airport. There are numerous points of interest surrounding the Bari hotel, such as Teatro Petruzzelli (7.6 km away), Forte di Sant'Antonio (7.8 km away) and Teatro Margherita (7.8 km away).

All accommodation units feature air conditioning and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace can be found in most rooms. Each accommodation unit features a double bed or a sofa-bed. Cots are available for children. A safe and a minibar also feature. Internet access, a TV and wireless internet access are provided for guests' convenience. In the bathrooms, guests will find a shower and a hairdryer.

The establishment was renovated in 2012. The establishment comprises a total of 28 accommodation units. A lobby and a reception are available to guests. Services and facilities at the hotel include internet access, wireless internet access, a library and a transfer service. Shopping facilities are available. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. Guests travelling in their own vehicles can make use of the available parking spaces.

The swimming pool is ideal for a refreshing dip. Sun loungers and parasols offer the ideal way to unwind. Variety is offered by the range of sports and leisure options available at the establishment, including beach volleyball, canoeing, kayaking, table tennis, bowling and a spa. A wellness area with a solarium is available.
The establishment offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast and half board. The establishment additionally offers snacks.

The following credit cards are accepted at the establishment: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.
Please note all early departures will be assessed room/tax for their entire stay.
